article.title: GD Awarded U.S. Air Force Research Laboratory Contract
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: General Dynamics Information Technology, Fairfax, Virginia, is being awarded a more than $45 million contract to provide Air Force Research Laboratory Materials and Manufacturing Directorate Technology division with a contract vehicle related to evolving materials and manufacturing technology.Â Air Force Research Laboratory, Wright Patterson Air Force Base, Ohio, is the contracting activity.
